content:
Someone added Own Ship to Editor Manual > Staging Pages > Own Ship . Who? I cannot quickly determine the differences with the Current Set Options > Own Ship.

Thank you.

@Terry Slattery Please identify where the differences are d Own Ship to Editor Manual > Staging Pages > Own Ship . Who? I cannot quickly determine the differences with the Current Set Options > Own Ship.
Yes, I had added it. There are some minor text differences due to the work I was doing on Tracking. I plan to review the changes and delete the Staging pages.
Ok Terry, if you would make the changes in the actual page and just note it with "FIXME Terry added" or whatever that would help. Thanks.

Everything that is in the STAGING PAGES/Own Ship is in the production copy. STAGING PAGES/Own Ship can be deleted. I don't think I have rights for that action.
I'll also take a look at any changes I made to the other pages I created under STAGING PAGES and let you know when they can be deleted.

@rick I've incorporated everything from the STAGING PAGES I created (Own Ship, Tracks, Toggle Tracking) and they may be deleted. I edited Track Properties, Tracks Tab, and Use Tracks. All changes are marked with "FIXME sailor1026"
Thanks Terry, much appreciated. That has saved me some time.

Terry did you find out how to delete a page here in the Editor Manual Remove page Perhaps you could try that with Staging Pages > Own Ship. If it does not work for you, let me know.

If it worksfor you, you could do the same for Staging > Tracks and Toggle Tracking.

I've reviewed your fixes and removed the FIXME's
Thank you. This is the kind of review we need.
Terry, I think it might not work , removing pages for you, but let me know. Thanks.
@Rick Gleason It looks like you've already removed the pages. Thanks!
